title: How to Make Deer Meat Chili

steps.headline: Combine the meat, onion, bell pepper and vinegar in a large pan.
steps.description: Cook until the meat is brown, while stirring to make it crumble. Drain off the drippings.

steps.headline: Reduce the heat and let it simmer.
steps.description: Uncovered and while stirring occasionally. Let it simmer for 30 minutes or until you think it's thick enough.

text: Combine the meat, onion, bell pepper and vinegar in a large pan. Cook until the meat is brown, while stirring to make it crumble. Drain off the drippings. Add all other ingredients. Cook until it boils. Reduce the heat and let it simmer. Uncovered and while stirring occasionally. Let it simmer for 30 minutes or until you think it's thick enough. Serve warm.
